content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(61, -52)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (61.0, -52.0)
- Furnace at position (63.0, -52.0)
- Furnace at position (65.0, -52.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to furnace inventory being full
- Ensure that the furnace has sufficient output capacity before adding more items to it. Monitor the inventory of the furnace to avoid reaching full capacity, which can halt production.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may block placement.
